comment: The most interesting professor I've ever had! Good at helping students individually on their projects. Really gets you to think outside the box which is important in design foundation courses. The ONLY downfall I had with the corse is he takes a long time to return grades on projects, but I do feel like he grades fairly and thats all that matters.

I took Manole for my first semester of design and I really liked his concept of architecture. He taught me how to think abstract, an it has helped me in my next studios. I am definetly looking on taking him again for future classes. I highly recommend this professor. He is awesome!

Forget the concept of a box, there never was one.  Great for getting you to design for yourself.  Very interesting character, open minded.  Not a good professor if you like a highly organized class.  Makes class fun and interesting.
Great Professor. Lets you find your way through the world of art and architecture. The only expectation is that you work hard and can defend your conclusions.
Don't even think about his class if you want an easy grade but if you truly want to get better - he will help you to get there.
Who cares about the grade!?! Eye-candy!  Apart from that he will make u think beyond until your brain aches!!! Don't take him for an easy grade.

He is the best of all 1st year profs. complicated but very good, makes u think for yourself, cares about reach outcome not just physical quality. Definitely take him if u want to learn, but ill warn u he talks a lot.Hes the best

For a one hour class with 3 hour lab afterwards, where you are supposed to be able to leave if you want to work on your own, he talked the whole four hours (almost straight) and would not let anyone leave.  Plus he gave twice as much work as the other section.
i have had Manole for jury, and just for lectures in general.  hes pretty interesting, and he is DEFINITELY GOOD TO LOOK AT!
he will surprise you... good prof. acnowleges work, and helps you grow.

Truly an Awesome prof.  REALLY!  If you start off with a fresh mind giving room to knoledge, you'll learn ALLOOOOOOTTT. FOR REAL. IT"S HARD TO GET TO KNOW HIM, AND TO FIGURE OUT WHAT HE LIKES<, but,, it's definitely worth it.
